quote: It doesn't matter if the glass is half empty or half full. Be grateful you have a glass - you're the only person that can decide what's in it. – Gurbaksh Chahal
fact: Isaac Asimov is the only author to have a book in every Dewey-decimal category.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What's orange and sounds like a parrot? A Carrot.
